title: A Clean Break
description: alternate cover edition of ISBN 9780993859861They’ve escaped Amish life—but can they really be free?A world away from their strict upbringing, David and Isaac no longer have to hide their love. Yet it’s not so easy navigating confusing “English” society and reconciling their sexuality and faith.While Isaac thrives at school and makes new friends, guilt haunts David for leaving his mother and sisters behind in Zebulon. The hustle and bustle of the city overwhelms him as he struggles to get his carpentry business off the ground.He and Isaac finally sleep side by side each night, but will David’s mounting fear and anxiety drive them miles apart?A Clean Break by Keira Andrews is the second book in a series of forbidden Amish love. This gay romance features explicit steamy exploration, found family, and soulmates fighting for their happy ending.
author: Keira Andrews
